item.title: Street Wrap：中美贸易框架是利好，等待签约
item.description: 据分析人士称，中美两国本周末的会谈是积极的，两国就一系列有争议的问题达成了一致，为两国领导人唐纳德-特朗普和习近平本周敲定协议创造了条件。【原文：The talks between the US and China this weekend were positive as the countries came to terms on a range of contentious points, setting the stage for leaders Donald Trump and Xi Jinping to finalize a deal this week, according to analysts.】

item.title: 亚洲最繁忙的财报周聚焦大型企业和科技股
item.description: 亚洲已进入本财报季最繁忙的一周，这对投资者来说是一个关键时刻，因为他们要寻找企业如何应对当前贸易紧张局势和经济不确定性的线索。【原文：Asia has entered its busiest week of the current earnings season, a crucial time for investors looking for clues on how companies are coping with ongoing trade tensions and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判取得进展，铜价将测试历史新高
item.description: 随着中美两国即将达成一项全面协议以缓和贸易紧张局势，缓解全球经济增长面临的重大风险，铜价将测试历史新高。【原文：Copper is set to test a record high with the US and China on the cusp of a sweeping deal to dial down trade tensions, easing a major risk to global economic growth.】

item.title: 韩国面临房地产 "定时炸弹"，李在镕支持 BOK 持股
item.description: 韩国总统李在明上周支持韩国央行维持利率不变的决定，并警告说韩国房地产市场是一个即将破灭的泡沫。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung warned that the country’s property market is a bubble on the point of bursting, as he backed the Bank of Korea’s decision to hold rates last week.】

item.title: 中美贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象，大豆跳涨
item.description: 大豆期货周一开盘上涨 1%，此前财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示中美两国接近达成贸易协议，其中可能包括 "大量 "购买大豆作物。【原文：Soybean futures rose 1% at the open on Monday after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent flagged that the US and China were close to a trade deal which could include “substantial” purchases of the crop.】

item.title: 日本首位女性财务总监是银行政策方面的资深专家
item.description: 片山聪树是日本第一位女性财政大臣，也是近几十年来为数不多的曾在强大的官僚机构担任过官员的女性之一。【原文：Satsuki Katayama is Japan’s first female finance minister, and also one of the few in her job in recent decades that previously worked as an official at the powerful bureaucracy.】

item.title: 中美贸易进展缓解避险需求，黄金跌幅扩大
item.description: 随着中美贸易协议的临近，以及有迹象表明贵金属炙手可热的涨势已走得太快太远，黄金出现了自 8 月中旬以来的首次单周下跌。【原文：Gold declined — after posting its first weekly drop since mid-August — as the US and China neared a trade agreement and on signs that a scorching rally in precious metals has run too far, too fast.】

item.title: 华为电动车合作伙伴 Seres 寻求在香港上市，融资 17 亿美元
item.description: Seres集团股份有限公司开始接受投资者的香港上市申请，此次上市可能募集高达132亿港元（17亿美元）的资金，使这家电动汽车制造商成为最近一家在金融中心上市的大型中国公司。【原文：Seres Group Co. started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong listing that may raise as much as HK$13.2 billion ($1.7 billion), making the electric-vehicle maker the latest big Chinese company to go public in the financial hub.】

item.title: 力拓对奥尤陶勒盖铜矿腐败问题展开调查
item.description: 力拓集团子公司奥尤陶勒盖有限责任公司（Oyu Tolgoi LLC）正在对其蒙古铜矿运营中的腐败和不道德行为指控进行内部调查，并寻求执法部门的帮助。【原文：Rio Tinto Group subsidiary Oyu Tolgoi LLC is conducting an internal investigation into allegations of corruption and unethical conduct at its copper operations in Mongolia and has sought help from law enforcement.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现出售，亿万富翁互相争夺
item.description: 其首席执行官试图拒绝派拉蒙的邀请。BTS 计划进行有史以来最大规模的巡演。【原文：Its CEO tries to head off Paramount's offer. BTS plans its biggest tour ever.】

item.title: 英国首相将在利雅得访问期间力促海湾地区达成贸易协议
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在访问沙特阿拉伯期间寻求加快与海湾国家的贸易谈判，因为她试图在其关键的预算案出台前提振该国的经济增长前景。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will seek to accelerate trade talks with the Gulf states during a visit to Saudi Arabia, as she tries to boost the country’s growth prospects ahead of her crucial budget.】

item.title: 中美贸易前景乐观，石油价格创六月以来最佳一周涨幅
item.description: 由于对中美两国将在本周达成贸易协议、从而提振需求前景的乐观情绪升温，石油价格在创下 6 月中旬以来的最大单周涨幅后上扬。【原文：Oil advanced after notching its biggest weekly advance since mid-June, as optimism increased that the US and China will reach a trade agreement this week that will boost the outlook for demand.】

item.title: 中国贸易协议取得进展，美国股市期货大涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）访问中国进行一系列外交谈判之际，美国和中国发出了即将完成全面贸易协议的信号，美国股市期货在亚洲早盘交易中攀升。【原文：US equity futures climbed in early Asia trading after the US and China signaled they were nearing completion of a sweeping trade deal, as President Donald Trump visits the region for a series of diplomatic talks.】

item.title: 李明博称特朗普访华前美韩基金在关键点上僵持不下
item.description: 韩国总统李在镕周五在接受采访时表示，美国和韩国在 3500 亿美元投资承诺的所有主要细节上仍存在分歧，这表明两国可能无法在与唐纳德-特朗普举行首脑会谈前及时敲定贸易协议。【原文：The US and South Korea remain stuck on all the major details of a $350 billion investment pledge, President Lee Jae Myung said in an interview Friday, signaling the countries may fail to finalize a trade deal in time for a summit meeting with Donald Trump.】

item.title: 日本央行和财政信号推动日本收益率差距缩小的赌注
item.description: 卖出短端日本国债、买入较长期限日本国债的策略正受到追捧，因为人们押注，即使新的财政支出迫在眉睫，日本央行进一步加息也会使收益率曲线趋于平缓。【原文：A strategy of selling short-end Japanese government bonds and buying longer maturities is gaining traction, on bets that further Bank of Japan rate hikes will flatten the yield curve even as new fiscal spending looms.】

item.title: 诺和诺德支持的 MapLight 在美国 IPO 和配售中融资 2.589 亿美元
item.description: MapLight Therapeutics 公司将通过首次公开募股和私募融资 2.589 亿美元，成为美国政府停摆以来首家通过非正常途径上市的公司。【原文：MapLight Therapeutics Inc. will raise $258.9 million in an initial public offering and private placement, becoming the first company to go public via an unusual route since the US government shutdown.】

item.title: 金银市场蓬勃发展，黄金交易员招聘热潮推动薪酬上涨
item.description: 随着人们对黄金的兴趣飙升，贸易公司、对冲基金和银行都在大肆招聘专业黄金交易员，从而引发了一场人才争夺战，并提高了这个历来都是利基市场的薪酬待遇。【原文：Trading houses, hedge funds and banks are on a hiring spree for specialist gold traders as interest in the metal soars, creating a battle for talent that is driving up pay packages in what has historically been a niche market.】

item.title: 阿根廷中期选举结果的最新进展
item.description: 2025年10月26日星期日，阿根廷布宜诺斯艾利斯省拉普拉塔，选民在中期选举投票站排队等候投票。阿根廷周日将举行中期选举投票，这将是对哈维尔-米莱总统雄心勃勃的紧缩政策以及特朗普政府可能提供的 400 亿美元救援计划的一次重要公投。【原文：Voters wait in line to cast ballots at a polling station during the midterm elections in La Plata, Buenos Aires province, Argentina, on Sunday, Oct. 26, 2025. Argentina is voting Sunday in a midterm election that will serve as a crucial referendum on President Javier Milei's ambitious austerity policies and, potentially, a $40 billion rescue package from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 锁定降息押注，国债交易员关注美联储信号
item.description: 美国国债市场的投资者相信美联储将在本周再次降息，他们正将注意力转向决策者对未来道路发出的信号。【原文：Investors in the US Treasuries market, confident the Federal Reserve will deliver another interest-rate cut this week, are turning their attention to what policymakers signal about the path ahead.】

item.title: 通货紧缩消退，就业面临风险，澳大利亚央行准备迎接政策考验
item.description: 就在澳大利亚央行有望实现其通胀和就业目标之际，新的数据可能表明，新出现的不利因素对利率制定委员会的假设提出了挑战。【原文：Just as Australia’s central bank was on track to meet its inflation and employment mandate, fresh data may suggest emerging headwinds that challenge the interest rate-setting board’s assumptions.】

item.title: 诺华同意以 120 亿美元收购 Avidity 生物科学公司
item.description: 瑞士制药商诺华公司同意收购生物技术公司 Avidity Biosciences Inc.【原文：Novartis AG agreed to buy biotechnology company Avidity Biosciences Inc. in a deal that values it at $12 billion, according to the Swiss drugmaker.】

item.title: Palantir 将与波兰国防部签署意向书
item.description: 根据波兰国防部的一份声明，Palantir 科技公司将于周一与波兰国防部签署一份意向书。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. will on Monday sign a letter of intent with Poland’s Defense Ministry, according to a statement from the ministry.】

item.title: 美联储的分歧将在进一步缩表的辩论中加深
item.description: 预计美联储本周将连续第二次降息，以支持摇摆不定的就业市场。然而，任何将宽松周期延长至10月以后的举措都可能会再次遭到对通胀依然感到焦虑的官员们的反对。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to deliver a second straight interest-rate cut this week to support a wobbly job market. Any push to extend the easing cycle past October, however, may face renewed opposition from a group of officials who remain anxious over inflation.】

item.title: 波动性减弱，市场脆弱考验期权交易者
item.description: 股市并不特别动荡。但它仍然很脆弱。【原文：The stock market isn’t particularly volatile. Still, it’s fragile.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特公司将把炼油厂产能提高一倍多
item.description: 尼日利亚 Dangote 炼油厂计划将产能扩大到每天 140 万桶。【原文：Nigeria’s Dangote refinery plans to expand its capacity to 1.4 million barrels a day.】

item.title: 科技巨头发布财报，牛市决胜周来临
item.description: 本周有两天很可能决定美国股市今年余下时间的走向。【原文：Two days this week are likely to dictate the direction of the US stock market for the remainder of the year.】

item.title: iPad Pro 的下一步是什么？与 iPhone 17 Pro 类似的气室
item.description: 苹果公司正在研究一种蒸汽腔体，以改善最早于 2027 年推出的 iPad Pro 的散热和性能。此外：该公司在为苹果地图引入广告的计划上取得了进展，而配备 18 英寸屏幕的可折叠 iPad 在开发过程中遇到了阻碍。【原文：Apple is working on a vapor chamber to improve cooling and performance in an iPad Pro slated for as early as 2027. Also: The company makes headway on a plan to bring ads to Apple Maps, and a foldable iPad with an 18-inch screen hits development snags.】

item.title: 特朗普访华为最受冷落的新兴市场地区带来希望
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普对东南亚的访问为该地区带来了一线希望，该地区的股票一直是新兴市场综合体中表现最差的。【原文：Donald Trump’s visit to Southeast Asia is offering a glimmer of hope for the region, whose stocks have been among the worst-performing in the emerging markets complex.】

item.title: 澳大利亚探讨修改版权法以应对人工智能挑战
item.description: 澳大利亚政府将于周一召开为期两天的会议，探讨版权框架的变化，以应对人工智能带来的挑战。【原文：The Australian government will convene a two-day meeting on Monday to explore changes to its copyright framework, as it seeks to meet the challenges posed by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 私人信贷巨头在沙特流动性紧缩中寻找机会
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯雄心勃勃的经济多样化项目已经耗尽了银行系统的流动性，私人信贷巨头们开始在沙特阿拉伯争夺交易。【原文：The titans of private credit are beginning to jockey for deals in Saudi Arabia, where liquidity in the banking system has been drained by the kingdom’s ambitious economic diversification projects.】
